testcase.name: Creation of a book collection

testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: -- @1.1 Given the collection's name: Math Books, a description and type of privacy: True ... passed in 0.004s And the book "Baldor's Algebra" with 10 points ... passed in 0.003s When the user creates the collection ... passed in 0.009s Then the collection will be created with the given name, description and type of privacy ... passed in 0.003s And will contain the given book ... passed in 0.002s And will have 10 points ... passed in 0.001s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: -- @1.2 Given the collection's name: Chemistry Books, a description and type of privacy: False ... passed in 0.003s And the book "The name of the wind" with 20 points ... passed in 0.003s When the user creates the collection ... passed in 0.007s Then the collection will be created with the given name, description and type of privacy ... passed in 0.003s And will contain the given book ... passed in 0.005s And will have 20 points ... passed in 0.001s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: -- @1.3 Given the collection's name: Personal Books, a description and type of privacy: True ... passed in 0.003s And the book "The way to the self-discovery" with 30 points ... passed in 0.003s When the user creates the collection ... passed in 0.007s Then the collection will be created with the given name, description and type of privacy ... passed in 0.002s And will contain the given book ... passed in 0.002s And will have 30 points ... passed in 0.001s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Calculating the value of a collection
